price: Dia berkata, "Hai kaumku mengapa kamu minta disegerakan keburukan sebelum (kamu minta) kebaikan? Hendaklah, kamu meminta ampun kepada Allah agar kamu mendapat rahmat".
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
